attributes.comment:
Please reconsider the proposed increase to the fees required for the citizenship
process. By increasing the fees you will make United States citizenship available
only to the wealthy and to those who are single, without multiple families
members requiring fees..

The United States of America was founded and established by immigrants. All of
our families immigrated, either centuries or years ago. If our families had been
required to pass the number of requirements now in place and to pay the fees
proposed, how many of them could have even considered citizenship?

It is important that we keep this country the Great Democracy, a society that is
open to all. Do not increase the required fees to the point that money keeps
people from seeking citizenship.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Cynthia L. Johnson
